thread.title: adidas Is Releasing the Ultra Boost 3.0 in a New “Energy Red” Colorway
thread.title_full: adidas Is Releasing the Ultra Boost 3.0 in a New “Energy Red” Colorway

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: adidas Is Releasing the Ultra Boost 3.0 in a New “Energy Red” Colorway
text:
Previous Next 
After recently getting a look at the LGBT pride iteration , we’re back with another new colorway of adidas’ Ultra Boost 3.0 . 
This particular pair goes by the name “Energy Red,” as it boasts touches of both bright red and orange throughout the breathable upper. Black accents at the heel and outsole provide contrast, while white shading takes over the Boost tooling accordingly. Lastly, speckled laces accompany to complete the forthcoming Boost delivery. 
You can look forward to the “Energy Red” Ultra Boost 3.0 ($180 USD) releasing on February 1 through adidas .
